mapper.select: SELECT A.SEQ, A.BURGER AS BURGER_SEQ, C.NAME AS BURGER_NAME, A.SIDE AS SIDE_SEQ, D.NAME AS SIDE_NAME, A.BEVERAGE AS BEVERAGE_SEQ ,E.NAME AS BEVERAGE_NAME,A.NAME, A.CREATOR, A.PRICE, A.CAL,A.DEL, B.ID AS creatorID FROM BB_MENU A, BB_MEMBER B, BB_BURGER C, BB_SIDE D, BB_BEVERAGE E WHERE A.CREATOR = B.SEQ(+) AND A.BURGER = C.SEQ(+) AND A.SIDE = D.SEQ(+) AND A.BEVERAGE = E.SEQ(+) ORDER BY SEQ

SELECT A.SEQ, A.NAME, A.PRICE, A.CAL, A.DEL, A.CREATOR, NVL(C.NAME, 'admin') CREATORID ,B.IMAGE_SRC, A.BREAD, A.INGREDIENT01, A.INGREDIENT02, A.INGREDIENT03,A.INGREDIENT04,A.INGREDIENT05, A.INGREDIENT06,A.INGREDIENT07,A.INGREDIENT08,A.INGREDIENT09 FROM BB_BURGER A, (SELECT * FROM BB_IMAGE WHERE TABLE_NAME='BB_BURGER') B, BB_MEMBER C WHERE A.SEQ = B.REF_SEQ(+) AND A.CREATOR=C.SEQ(+) AND A.SEQ=#{seq}
SELECT A.SEQ, A.NAME, A.PRICE , A.CAL, A.DEL, B.IMAGE_SRC FROM BB_SIDE A, (SELECT * FROM BB_IMAGE WHERE TABLE_NAME='BB_SIDE') B WHERE A.SEQ = B.REF_SEQ(+) AND A.SEQ=#{seq}
SELECT A.SEQ, A.NAME, A.PRICE , A.CAL, A.DEL, B.IMAGE_SRC FROM BB_BEVERAGE A, (SELECT * FROM BB_IMAGE WHERE TABLE_NAME='BB_BEVERAGE') B WHERE A.SEQ = B.REF_SEQ(+) AND A.SEQ=#{seq}

SELECT A.SEQ, A.NAME, NVL((SELECT NAME FROM BB_INGREDIENT WHERE SEQ=(SELECT BREAD FROM BB_BURGER WHERE SEQ=#{seq} )),'') BREAD_NAME, NVL((SELECT NAME FROM BB_INGREDIENT WHERE SEQ=(SELECT INGREDIENT01 FROM BB_BURGER WHERE SEQ=#{seq} )),'') INGREDIENT01_NAME, NVL((SELECT NAME FROM BB_INGREDIENT WHERE SEQ=(SELECT INGREDIENT02 FROM BB_BURGER WHERE SEQ=#{seq} )),'') INGREDIENT02_NAME, NVL((SELECT NAME FROM BB_INGREDIENT WHERE SEQ=(SELECT INGREDIENT03 FROM BB_BURGER WHERE SEQ=#{seq} )),'') INGREDIENT03_NAME, NVL((SELECT NAME FROM BB_INGREDIENT WHERE SEQ=(SELECT INGREDIENT04 FROM BB_BURGER WHERE SEQ=#{seq} )),'') INGREDIENT04_NAME, NVL((SELECT NAME FROM BB_INGREDIENT WHERE SEQ=(SELECT INGREDIENT05 FROM BB_BURGER WHERE SEQ=#{seq} )),'') INGREDIENT05_NAME, NVL((SELECT NAME FROM BB_INGREDIENT WHERE SEQ=(SELECT INGREDIENT06 FROM BB_BURGER WHERE SEQ=#{seq} )),'') INGREDIENT06_NAME, NVL((SELECT NAME FROM BB_INGREDIENT WHERE SEQ=(SELECT INGREDIENT07 FROM BB_BURGER WHERE SEQ=#{seq} )),'') INGREDIENT07_NAME, NVL((SELECT NAME FROM BB_INGREDIENT WHERE SEQ=(SELECT INGREDIENT08 FROM BB_BURGER WHERE SEQ=#{seq} )),'') INGREDIENT08_NAME, NVL((SELECT NAME FROM BB_INGREDIENT WHERE SEQ=(SELECT INGREDIENT09 FROM BB_BURGER WHERE SEQ=#{seq} )),'') INGREDIENT09_NAME, A.CREATOR , A.PRICE, A.CAL,A.DEL , NVL(B.IMAGE_SRC,'없음') IMAGE_SRC FROM BB_BURGER A, (SELECT * FROM BB_IMAGE WHERE TABLE_NAME='BB_BURGER') B WHERE A.SEQ = B.REF_SEQ(+) AND A.SEQ=#{seq}
